globals.title: Tec Clearance Calculator
globals.description: Page to calculate the clearances and dimensions of the glass for Tec product installation
globals.alert: The calculator is intended solely to support the interpretation and application of the formulas presented in the product manual, with the user being fully responsible for the accuracy of the data and measurements entered in the tables.

products.name: VDPO 2 DOORS
products.title: Clearance calculation for VDPO 2 Doors
products.subtitle: Installation for tempered glass
products.description: Model without the use of side door profile with built-in lock

content.title: Number of glasses
content.panelsDescription: Enter here the number of panels to be installed between the doors.
content.doorsDescription: For this model we have doors on both sides! Non-editable number.

content.title: Lock deduction
content.description: Here you enter the additional measurement, per door, for lock adjustment.

text.text: If you want to use a handle or other type of accessory, you can use larger clearances (e.g., 230mm, 250mm...) per door!

content.label: Door
